formatted_address: Jalan Bendahara, East Ledang, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Jardin Cafe

reviews.text:
According to Google Maps, this is a Top Rated establishment. After looking at the various user reviews, at a whim I brought my family here for a Sunday brunch. We left this place beaming with satisfaction and pleasant memories.

The ambience, vibe, food quality and customer service largy succeed at being Top Rated. Highly recommended ðŸ‘Œ

This is a beautiful little cafe, very attractive seating and comfortable to have a relax and chitchat with friends. The menu has some interesting things on it, we had avocado toast and "crisps and dips". The dips were really delicious indeed and good portions. The turkish coffee is very authentic and fragrant. Best coffee I have had for awhile, and I must return to try their other offerings. Staff were all very nice. And the proprietress is a lovely, friendly person who makes you feel very welcome. Thank you so much!

Foods are delicious. The price is suprisingly reasonable come with big portion and good presentation. The services are top-notch. They serve you free drink. We came in evening, so the place were not crowded that time. Very cozy place. Definitely will come again.
JardÃ­n vibe is the selling point for me, beautiful trees. Location wise is convenient away from the traffic. Food can be better, chill spot to hang around for coffee and bites!

Ordered chicken chop and crunchy chicken. Both priced rm29 and portion was big, so very worth it. The wedges tasted good on its own and the sauce only elevated the flavours. Cafe latter was a but bland maybe cause too much ice(?) Service was not so bad. It is a bit humid there so i hope they fix the air conditioner. The interior, was nice and very relaxing with those jazz music they play on. Would come again, i hope this place gains more popularity because its honestly a nice go to. Only thing i was a bit taken aback was the 10% service fee. Quite high id say. Total spent was rm95 for teo prople

vicinity: Jalan Bendahara, East Ledang, Iskandar Puteri
